title: Use Newton's Second Law
text: Use Newton's Second Law $$(F=ma)$$ to calculate the acceleration of the rocket sled. Consider the thrust, frictional force, and mass of the system.

title: Steps
text: Step 1: Apply Newton's Second Law to calculate the acceleration of the rocket sled using the given thrust, frictional force, and mass. Step 2: Clearly show all calculations and units.
